message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take 60% and you can have 40%. It's better to get something than nothing, and we both get a good amount.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out.  A 55/45 split seems fair considering the time pressure.
I'll meet you halfway on your previous offer. 52.5% for me, 47.5% for you. It's a fair compromise considering the decreasing value of money.
